name: user_tweets_replies_by_screen_name
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_v2.
Tool description: Twitter public data API for Tweets and users
API description: Fetches the tweets and replies of a specified user by their screen name using the Twitter API.

username.description: The screen name of the user whose tweets and replies are to be fetched.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination, if any. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The maximum number of tweets and replies to fetch. Defaults to '40'.
